name: Orbital
overview: The object of the game is to clear the screen of all coloured balls, within the given time limit. To do this you need to bring together 3 or more balls of the same colour, in a vertical or horizontal manner. This will then cause the matching balls to promptly disappear. Spinning a ball changes its colour, you can change any colour apart from Grey. There are four zones ranging from easy to nearly impossible and 3 levels per zone to overcome. You can also choose a timed game or a faster, albeit slightly harder Logic Game.
